install.name: Content - Prova Advanced Social Bookmarker (with AddThis.com tracking)
install.author: Prova

param.name: inc_cat
param.label: Categories To Include
param.description: List (comma-seperated) those categories that you want this plugin to display for (example: 1,2,5,9)

param.name: exc_cat
param.label: Categories To Exclude
param.description: Display this plugin on ALL categories except these (comma-seperated. example: 1,2,5,9). Any entry here turns the 'Categories to include' option off.

param.name: bot_prec_html
param.default: Add this page to your favorite Social Bookmarking websites
param.label: HTML above buttons
param.description: Put any HTML or plain text into this box that you want to appear above the AddThis.com buttons

param.name: bot_fol_html
param.label: HTML below buttons
param.description: Put any HTML or plain text in this box that you want to appear below the AddThis.com buttons

param.name: add_this_username
param.label: AddThis.com Username
param.description: Your AddThis.com username should go here. It is free and will track your bookmark stats. Go to http://www.addthis.com to get one

param.name: add_this_word
param.label: More button label
param.description: Enter the word(s) you want to appear as the link to the popup window for more social sites

param.name: badge1
param.label: 1st Button
param.description: Which button would you like to display first

param.name: badge2
param.label: 2nd Button
param.description: Which button would you like to display second

param.name: badge3
param.label: 3rd Button
param.description: Which button would you like to display third

param.name: badge4
param.label: 4th Button
param.description: Which button would you like to display fourth

param.name: badge5
param.label: 5th Button
param.description: Which button would you like to display fifth

param.name: badge_side
param.label: Page Side
param.description: Select which side of the article you want your buttons to display on

param.name: twitteruser1
param.label: Twitter Username
param.description: Enter your twitter username to send all tweets with your @name instead of the button company's @name.

param.name: twitteruser2
param.label: Secondary Twitter Username
param.description: If you're using Twitter's button, you can recommend a second twitter user

param.name: twitter2desc
param.label: Secondary Twitter Description
param.description: If you're using Twitter's button and recommend a second twitter user, describe the user

param.name: leader
param.default: tweet, facebook_like, digg, delicious, technorati, stumbleupon
param.label: Footer Leader Button
param.description: If you want buttons for specific social sites to appear BEFORE the default AddThis.com popup button, enter them here. To add buttons, enter the name of each site, separated by a comma, in the order you want the buttons to appear. Visit Prova.com for more info.

param.name: addthispill
param.label: AddThis Counter
param.description: Do you want to use the new AddThis pill-style counter or the legacy AddThis 'More' Link?
